title: REVEALED: Over 50,000 Americans 65 and over died within two weeks of vaccine
cleaned_text:
FACT: Over 50,000 Americans aged 65 and over died within the first two weeks.

But the true scale may never be known.

American Attorney Thomas Renz: “They say, ‘Well, we don’t count anyone as vaccinated until 14 days after their full vaccination,’ so that means until 14 days after your second dose, it’s not counted. Well, they did that because they know most reactions occur within 14 days of either your first or second dose… [As of] November/December [2021], there were 52,000ish [people aged 65 and up] who died within 14 days.” Watch:

See more episodes at https://cvdsecrets.com/own
